snippet: The former basketball star Dennis Rodman, who befriended the nation’s leader, Kim Jong-un, was due to arrive Thursday to train its top players.
lead_paragraph: The former basketball star Dennis Rodman, who befriended the nation’s leader, Kim Jong-un, was due to arrive Thursday to train its top players.

headline.main: Rodman Headed to North Korea Again Despite Turmoil
headline.print_headline: Rodman Headed to North Korea Again Despite Turmoil
